it appears that azalia audio is a joint effort for HD Audio standards from Intel and a few others, the issue is that the intel module may not work... I'm researching this further

not a bug per say, but it may actually be and INTEL driver or and ATI driver that you need... not sure yet

version 16
the more I think about this, the more I wonder if you need the development modules from the backports repos

basically, the backports would allow you to install the experimental version of the Azalia driver via synaptic, likely the generic ones don't work

you need deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu hardy-backports main universe multiverse restricted
